title: Chest (Isle of Souls Dungeon)

properties.name: description
properties.value: The chest is a thievable chest in the Isle of Souls Dungeon that requires level 28 Thieving to steal from. Each chest yields 150 experience, and the chest's loot respawns instantly. These chests are the only ones where players can obtain a dark key, which is used to loot the Dark Chest in the Crumbling Tower basement.

Chest

MembersYes

LocationIsle of Souls Dungeon
ExamineI wonder what's inside it.
Map
Advanced data
Object ID40739

The chest is a thievable chest in the Isle of Souls Dungeon that requires level 28 Thieving to steal from. Each chest yields 150 experience, and the chest's loot respawns instantly. These chests are the only ones where players can obtain a dark key, which is used to loot the Dark Chest in the Crumbling Tower basement.

Upon failing to loot the chest, there is a 1 in 6 chance (after failing thieving roll)[1] to get teleported north-east of the dungeon entrance. Carrying a lockpick increases the rate at which players successfully pick the lock of these chests.

In order to save inventory space when looting the chest, it is recommended to bring a gem bag and herb sack.
